text: Cooper lands and rolls to his feet--he looks at the exit
Jump!  JUMP! Filmore JUMPS-- Cooper catches her and HUGS HER, pulling her to the groun OLO jumps and lands--
The WAVE is right behind ATKINS--ROARING at him--

Atkins LEAPS as the acid wash SPEWS out the hole, emptyin concrete, hissing- Atkins lands on his ankle and crumples up, convulsing in WASH cascading right behind him-- Cooper maintains his protective hug, perhaps a beat too l trickle-- He turns and looks back at Cooper and Filmore--
Are you alright!
Where's Atkins? Atkins clutches ankle, rolling--
Ahh Jesus, it's broken-- Olo stands up and looks--

He's hurt! BLAM BLAM BLAM! Bullets rip through Olo as he stands up-- the ground as Cooper and Filmore dive behind a protective Bullets POCK-MARK the concrete, ricocheting-- Cooper pokes up and BLASTS AWAY-- NAILING a terrorist in the face--  Another one emerges from behind, GUN BLAZING-- A bullet ricochets, ripping through the skin of Cooper's Filmore decides to react-- She rolls and grabs Olo's .45-- Whips around up and FIRES WILDLY-- WASTING the gunman-- Cooper reacts and jumps up, FIRING at the front-- KILLING the last gunmen-- Cooper looks at Filmore--impressed by her shooting skills Atkins groans on the ground, hands on his ears- Filmore checks Olo--DEAD-- Cooper runs over and checks Atkins--
It's not broken-- Cooper extends his hand--
It is!  It's broken! Cooper pulls him up--snatching a machine gun on the way--
C'mon let's go--while we have a chance! He gestures to Filmore--
Get the gun! Filmore snatches up a machine gun from the dead terrorist
The sergeant addresses Lt. Jackson--
Sir all checkpoints report seeing nothing.
Whatever happens I want them to hold their fire!   Jackson stares at the compound through his binoculars--
They're up to something...and we're goddamn helpless...
Richter approaches Smitty:
What's happening at the waterfront?
We're almost done piping in directly to  the Olympia.  Should have it all in about an hour or so.
Excellent.   He looks around--
Where's the camera?  I'm coming up with all these great ideas... Suddenly another TERRORIST--BURNS--approaches Richter--
We got trouble.  That bodyguard son- of-a-bitch has them running all over  the field--just took out three on the  north end!
Well get someone down there!
There isn't anyone! He's opened that whole sector now! Something suddenly troubles Richter--
That bastard's trying to upstage me! Smitty looks at him like he's crazy; Richter looks back a
Is he with the girl?
I don't know--look!  They can get in now, man!  We got no one left to guard  it! Richter gives him a condescending look--
Then what are you standing here for? get down there!  Now!
Cooper, Filmore, and Atkins carefully approach a corner o The compound's FENCES are a hundred yards ahead of them. Cooper looks out, then back at Filmore, then back out.
Now what?
There's the fence...
We'll never make it!  There's no  place to hide--we'll be cut down!
How badly do you want to get out of here?
Atkins is right--they'll kill us for sure! Cooper looks out, then back at Filmore again--he realizes sinks in--
I'm going first.  Taking the fire. If we go out together we're all dead!
What are you talking about?
They probably have guards on the roof--and they're gonna be firing at me--not you!
What makes you so sure?
Because I'll be firing at them.
You're talking about committing  suicide!
I say we go back that way!
Around the building?  On your bum leg? You have to get out of here right now! Filmore doesn't want Cooper to go--
Look you're supposed to save my life!  It's in your contract,  remember? Cooper looks back hard at her--
That's right. It's in my contract.
What about rule one:  never let the person you are protecting out of your sight!
Rule two:  without alternative, use  yourself as a shield. She falls silent; Cooper masks his feelings:
Don't worry about me, Filmore. Your father owes me a week's pay-- and I intend to collect it. Filmore just looks at him--Cooper gets down to business--
In a minute you're going to hear  gunfire--if you want to live you'll run for that fence as fast as you can!  Cooper and Atkins exchange looks--
Understand? Cooper then looks at Filmore--
Goodbye-- Cooper springs off--
He BOLTS OUT-- Within seconds--GUNFIRE-- Filmore turns to Atkins--
Let's go! Atkins freezes in terror--grabs her--
We can't!  We'll be shot!
Cooper runs across the building, FIRING  at the roof--
Filmore tries to push a terrified Atkins away--
Let go! She breaks free and BOLTS for the fence as fast as she ca Atkins watches her--not knowing what to do--
Filmore runs as fast as she can--gunfire fills the air-- She is getting nearer to the fence--
Atkins panics, and decides to go-- He begins to hobble frantically toward the fence--
Filmore is about 200 yards away-- Atkins is about halfway--

Suddenly BURNS bursts out a door and sees Atkins-- He raises his .45--AIMS-- Atkins staggers in vain-- BLAM BLAM BLAM--bullets rip through his chest--he collaps Filmore sees this and turns around--FIRES at Burns but ru Burns begins to RUN after her-- She drops the gun and SPRINTS with all of her strength-- Burns is RAPIDLY approaching-- Filmore gets to the 20 ft.-high fence--LEAPS on it--
A SHARPSHOOTER watching through a scope radios Jackson:
I got the congresswoman in range--she's-- trying to escape--someone's after her-- POV SCOPE--Filmore climbing--blocking access to Burns who closer--
(frantically)
Hold your fire!  Hold your fire!!!
We see Filmore almost home free--STRUGGLING-- WHAM!  Burns grabs her leg--she FIGHTS-- He YANKS HER off the fence-- POV SCOPE--Centered squarely at Burns' head-- SHARPSHOOTER(O.S.)
I can get him! JACKSON(O.S.)
Goddamn it hold your fire! Burns drags Filmore away--

Cooper sprints for the fence around the corner-- A final gunman reaches the corner of a building and FIRES Cooper rips around-- BLAM BLAM BLAM-- the gunman crashes to the ground-- Cooper SPRINTS for the fence--
Cooper breaks out of the brush and looks frantically for anywhere--nothing-- Suddenly-- VOICE (O.S.)
Freeze! Cooper whips around to see a CAMOUFLAGED SOLDIER aiming a hands--drops the grenade launcher-- COOPER
Secret service--hold your fire! We got hostages coming out this way!! The soldier approaches him and scans the woods-- Cooper begins to head toward the soldier-- SOLDIER
I said FREEZE!  Or I'll blow your  fucking head off-- Cooper obliges--
Burns speaks to Richter on a VISUAL INTERCOM--he's holdin head-- BURNS
I got the girl. Richter is beside himself with delight-- RICHTER
Oh that's good news--good news! Bring her up here!  Just in time  for our final episode.   He looks around-- RICHTER
I tell you everything is shaping up just fine, my friends...
With his hands on his head, Cooper is escorted at gunpoin  SOLDIER
I caught this one out back sir! Jackson looks at him, and then the soldier-- JACKSON
You idiot! Put the gun down!   The soldier obliges--Cooper puts his hands down-- COOPER
Goddammit where is she?! Jackson glares at him- JACKSON
A for effort Cooper--they grabbed  her going over the fence-- Cooper is devastated--can't believe it-- COOPER
No... JACKSON looks back at Cooper-- LT. JACKSON
It was a matter of seconds. Cooper is bewildered-- Suddenly a communications tech turns to Jackson-- TECH

Lt. Jackson sir!  The satellite's up again! Jackson and Cooper approach the television screen-- Coopers EYES WIDEN-- CLOSE on TV SCREEN-- Filmore's is thrown into an armchair--Richter sits beside RICHTER

Well well, I'd like to give a word of  thanks to our secret serviceman.  If he's providing a service, it sure seems secret to me! Richter laughs-- CLOSE REACTION of COOPER, watching, clenching his jaw--
RICHTER

Whatever the case, I'm honored to have such a lovely panel guest for this final taping.  I'm sure my television family understands when I say we've been through a lot of laughter, and a lot of tears  together.  How do you feel about that,  Helen? Filled with hate, sick of being afraid-- FILMORE
Go fuck yourself... RICHTER

Hey now!  No cussing on TV!  Well in  closing I'd like to say that there are two reasons to have that money outside in an hour.  One is my perky co-anchor here, and the second is the lives of tens of thousands of people--people just like you and me! Richter gets up, and gets extremely close to the lens, lo RICHTER
God bless each and every one of  you...goodnight. The transmission ends-- Jackson looks at Cooper, whose eyes are fixed in a steely COOPER
I have a score to settle with him...
We see Sen Filmore, Myers, and White watching the broadca phone, gestures to the men-- ASSISTANT
Senator they have Ryan Cooper--he made it out! Se. Filmore is deeply disappointed--it reads in his eyes- SEN. FILMORE
I don't understand--I don't understand at all! ASSISTANT
He requests permission to re-enter the compound! MYERS
Permission denied--he had his chance! Any sign of assault and they'll blow the place! ASSISTANT
He's insisting sir! MYERS
I want him to keep his ass out of it! Restrain him if you have to!  Or we'll have another Leizburg on our hands!
A BRINKS truck approaches the mobile camp sight, passing- JACKSON is on the phone next to an anxious Cooper-- JACKSON
OK--I got it.  Right--yeah its here--Roger! He hangs up-- COOPER
What the hell is the problem! JACKSON
The problem is I have orders from Washington--so cool you're ass off! No one goes anywhere! We're gonna  make        the deal! Jackson looks at Cooper-- JACKSON
I'm sorry, Cooper!
Two armed guards get out and open the rear doors--we see
Cooper walks away, disgusted with himself, deep in though A medic approaches Cooper: MEDIC

Let me take a look at that shoulder-- Cooper shrugs him off angrily-- The medic looks at him, then shrugs and leaves-- He stands near Jackson's command tent, staring at Chemco Glancing at the table nearby him, he sees something that It's a FLOORPLAN of the Chemco facility--under a pair of He approaches it as the SERGEANT suddenly steps out of th his way out-- Cooper resumes looking at the floorplan-- He locates CENTRAL OPERATIONS--and looks up--
Richter finishes tying Filmore's hands--she stands rigid- RICHTER
I'm glad you're still around Helen-- we have a lot of catching up to do. He produces a new blinfold-- RICHTER
I hope you don't mind all this--it's just that the networks will eat it up, you know... FILMORE
You're going to pay for this... RICHTER
You got it all backwards, Helen--but  that's OK, you work for the government... He ties the blindfold around her eyes-- RICHTER
I will be getting paid for this--how much I don't know, but let's put it this way-- He gets close to her ear-- RICHTER
It's not gonna fit in a damn suitcase. He finishes tying the blindfold--
The cameramen--Black and Green--now act as PILOTS--they c and head to two separate HELICOPTERS-- They get in and START THEM UP--
Jackson hears the helicopters starting up-- LT. JACKSON
What do they think they're doing?  He heads over to the table to get his binoculars, and not -he looks around-- LT JACKSON
Jackson looks up, knowing full well who took it-- JACKSON
Shit! He picks up the field telephone-- JACKSON
Get me Washington!

A GUNMAN keeps a lookout for any activity--suddenly-- POV something moving through the brush outside the fence- He squints but sees nothing-- He flips his NIGHT VISION GLASSES down around his eyes-- POV--someone RUNNING through the brush-- The gunman FIRES--AGAIN-- Someone is RUNNING toward the gate--LIGHTNING FAST-- The gunman fires again--CAN'T HIT HIM-- COOPER rolls, dives, and does his best to dodge the gunfi This PISSES OFF the gunman, who gets up and FIRES at Coop But Cooper is in, safe behind a corner of the building-- The gunman grabs his walkie-- GUNMAN
Someone just went over the fence south end!
Richter perks up at this, answers back as Filmore looks o RICHTER
Our first deserter--who was it? GUNMAN(O.S.)
No--INCOMING INCOMING--he's inside-- Filmore realizes its Cooper--Richter is disappointed-- RICHTER
Sounds like I have to have a talk with the boys in D.C...

A man brandishing a GRENADE LAUNCHER runs toward the soun He approaches a CORNER, sliding up against the wall, aimi Getting closer... He is JUMPED from behind--Cooper grabs his neck-- The man struggles--Cooper has him in a STRANGLEHOLD-- The gunman pulls a COMBAT BLADE from his side-- But Cooper GRABS the man's arm and JAMS the blade into hi dead-- Cooper grabs the grenade launcher--checking the floorplan WALKWAY that leads him to central operations-- Cooper BURSTS THROUGH THE DOOR--INTO THE BUILDING--

Cooper rips ups a tall flight of steps to a thin GRATED W vats of chemicals-- Suddenly from ABOVE-- MUTT pounces on Cooper-- The man stagger across the precipitous walkway--Mutt STRU which falls on the grating-- BAM!--Cooper elbows Mutt in the face, then lands a COMBIN Mutt retaliates--swinging FURIOUSLY as the men struggle f SUDDENLY BURNS and another GUNMAN CHARGES up the stairs-- Cooper jumps--grabs a pipe-- And SLAMS Mutt off the walkway with both feet-- Mutt yells and falls 40 feet to his death-- POW POW POW!  Burns and the gunman fire at Nick who hits He grabs the grenade launcher-- The gunmen DIVE as-- The GRENADE hits a large VAT--IT BLOWS in a LOUD EXPLOSIO Acid CASCADES down on the screaming terrorists, INCINERAT
Lt Jackson is on the phone, people are screaming, soldier everyone has a GAS MASKS on-- LT. JACKSON
There's been an explosion, we have scattered gunfire--I don't know if they're going to blow the place... (listening)
Roger that!   He slams the phone down and addresses the sergeant: LT. JACKSON
Get everyone on stand by--alert status! We might have to move!
Sen. Filmore, Myers, and white talk on SPEAKERPHONE to Ri BROADCAST on TV, slightly delayed--but his expression dea RICHTER(O.S.)
I thought we had a deal.  MYERS
Of course we have a deal!  We have cash on site!  Everything you asked for! RICHTER(O.S.)
I told you to keep everyone at bay. You let me down! MYERS
He's not our man dammit!  We can't  stop him--he's a loose cannon! RICHTER(O.S.)
I'm very disappointed, gentlemen,  very disappointed...   Richter shakes his head, and picks up a DIGITAL METAL TIM CONSOLE--the timer displays 5:00--he depresses a button a
The men watching react anxiously-- RICHTER(O.S.)
I'm sorry but we're outta time!   Richter GRABS FILMORE around the neck, into the frame-- The senator watches-- SEN. FILMORE
Helen! Filmore struggles on screen--
MYERS
Don't do this!  We held up our end damn it!  What more do you want? RICHTER
I want to thank Chemco--for making the world a deadlier place to live.   The senator can hardly control himself-- SEN. FILMORE
That...bastard... Richter gives a final look to the camera-- RICHTER
Well I guess it's anchor's aweigh! So long, suckers! Richter reaches for the camera cable and YANKS IT--The sc
Richter yanks the blindfold off Filmore. RICHTER
You're a natural in front of the camera, you know that? Smitty approaches Richter as the last men file out of Cen SMITTY
Choppers are ready.  Let's get the fuck out of here. RICHTER
It's time gentleman--I hope you enjoyed the tour-- He grabs Helen out of her chair and they hastily make the PAN to the TIMER--3:59--3:58--3:57--
Richter pushes Filmore up the stairs-- RICHTER
Now the fun begins Helen--you like to travel?   The others follow behind up the stairs--
Cooper races down the hall--
Cooper turns the corner and checks the floorplan-- He looks up and SPRINTS--
Cooper approaches a DOOR at the end--it reads CENTRAL OPE

The door is THICK STEEL--and LOCKED-- Cooper struggles to open it--no luck-- He checks the grenade launcher--ONE GRENADE LEFT-- He runs back the other way-- Hew turns and FIRES the launcher-- The grenade EXPLODES--sending a ball of FIRE down the hal The flames clear and the door is partially blasted off, h hinge--  Cooper runs down the hall avoiding the licking flames and
Cooper arrives to find everyone is GONE-- COOPER
Son-of-a-bitch-- He sees the TIMER--cross-wired in a maddening way--imposs
He looks toward the other door and BOLTS out--as fast as
The helicopters are ready to go-- Richter shoves Filmore into one of the helicopters as the one-- RICHTER
Step lively--step lively-- THE SECOND HELICOPTER takes off--
Cooper FLIES up a stairwell--
We see the helicopter lift off and go away-- The sergeant approaches Jackson-- SERGEANT
We can take either one of them out  now, sir-- LT. JACKSON
We haven't got authorization!  They still have a hostage-- Jackson looks behind him-- JACKSON
Get everyone out of here--They've  timed it to blow!
The second helicopter slowly lifts off RICHTER (cheerfully)
We came, we saw, we looted--
Richter is sitting next to Filmore watching the building RICHTER
I'll tell ya life is a gas... when you've got a pretty girl  by your side--
The timer continues, in the room strewn with dead bodies-
Jackson watches intently--
Se. Filmore, Myers, and White watch the building from a t helplessly--
We see the timer--every couple of seconds we cut CLOSER--
There is a seconds pause-- BOOOOMMMM!  Central Operations EXPLODES IN A FIREBALL--se
A series of HUGE EXPLOSIONS rip through the windows at Ch
Richter and Filmore watch the destruction from above-- RICHTER
Hooooo-eeeee! Filmore looks out, letting out an anguished whisper: FILMORE
Cooper... No one hears her.
The helicopters disappear into the night sky--
Jackson watches the destruction and grabs the phone-- JACKSON
We got two choppers headed east- northeast--get special forces on their tail--now!
The men watch, dumbstruck-- MYERS
He's got the nerve-gas. He turns to White, who has his head in his hands... MYERS
We may have to take them down! SEN FILMORE
Are you mad!  My daughter's on one of those helicopters! MYERS
If they're carrying enough nerve gas to kill millions of people I'd say we have little choice, Senator! White interrupts--
WHITE
He wouldn't take it on the helicopters. He'd transport it through pipelines that connect Chemco to the waterfront... MYERS
What! WHITE
They were probably topping off a docked tanker while he stalled for time--without anyone being the wiser... A dismayed look crosses White's face-- WHITE (dismayed)
KZ70709 would be worth hundreds of  millions on the black market. Sen. Filmore is looking at a wallet photo of his daughter SEN. FILMORE
He doesn't even need her... He looks up, grasping for a thread of hope-- SEN. FILMORE
What about Cooper--where is he? MYERS
He's in there... They watch the image of the burning building on the TV... Sen. Filmore nods gravely, despairingly... Myers gets up and looks out-- MYERS
This guy Richter just upped the stakes. It's time we cracked down. He looks at the senator MYERS
Don't worry Henry.  We won't let them out of our site--this isn't over yet...

The two HELICOPTERS land near a TANKER, the OLYMPIA, dock end of a PIPELINE, the surviving members of the takeover hurrying on board as the ship prepares to depart-- RICHTER gets out, keeping Filmore securely by his side CAPTAIN STOCKTON, a windburned, grizzled old scab, cheerf STOCKTON
Right on time, Richter-- RICHTER

Helen this is Captain Stockton-- Captain, Congresswoman Helen Filmore, the pride of Ohio. Stockton extends his hand--Filmore just stares at him-- The captain looks her over, tipping his cap-- STOCKTON
Ma'am... Richter glances back at A HANDFUL OF SOLDIERS on alert with weapons drawn, mainta distance-- Richter smiles at Stockton-- RICHTER
Our traveler's insurance, you know what I mean? STOCKTON
Gotcha.  We've been filling barrels  all day--we've got  hell of a stockpile. RICHTER
Good. STOCKTON
I say we head out. RICHTER
Agreed--let's move it. STOCKTON
Are you hungry?  We can discuss some final arrangements over some slop in the galley. RICHTER
Captain it would be impossible to turn down such a gracious request. Richter looks at Filmore-- RICHTER
What say, Helen?  You haven't eaten all day--and come to think of it-- neither have I! Stockton and Richter laugh as Richter shoves her forward-

Leer at Filmore as she boards, grinning, looking like the dumpster--they trade snorts from a hip flask, their DRUNK ideas-- They remove the last chain mooring the ship and get on bo And then we see a HELICOPTER...

A STORAGE HATCH DOOR above the landing bar SLOWLY OPENS-- We see COOPER exit the cramped storage hatch--clothes dir he quickly gets his bearings-- When all is clear he LOOKS OUT at the Olympia--pulling ou He JUMPS and grabs the metal gate around the deck, pullin
The Olympia heads out to sea, Malaysia retreating in the
Cooper moves in and out of shadows below deck, getting hi bearings-- He sees a SAILOR checking an oil tank reading--he leaves Cooper moves on--
Seated in the galley, Richter, Stockton, and Filmore have dinner and wine. Richter and Stockton voraciously eat and drink, while Fil .. STOCKTON
My crew is going to work alongside with your men, don't worry--we're a team! RICHTER
Why should I worry?  Is there a  problem? STOCKTON
Well, there was uh, a little dissent about the amount of the bonus-- RICHTER
Dissent? STOCKTON
You know, when we reach Kompong Som-- Stockton chews and swallows-- STOCKTON
But I explained your generosity, and that settled the whole matter. Stockton freshens Richter's wine glass-- RICHTER
It's good to be back in business with you again, old friend.
Richter raises his glass: RICHTER
To the suckers of the world!  Without them we'd never succeed! The men click glasses--Filmore just listens-- Richter explains to Stockton-- FILMORE
Helen's a little upset.  She lost her  whole entourage of hangers-on today-- almost bought it herself, didn't she?   Well don't you worry Helen--from now  on its smooooth sailing. The two men laugh--
Cooper stealthily moves through a darkened corridor-- Up ahead a DOOR OPENS-- Cooper presses himself against the wall--hidden by a shad TWO SEAMEN exit the room--closing the door behind them-- SEAMAN

...I was a thousand miles from my old lady on a free port and just got paid-- ten grand in my pocket... After a few seconds they turn a corner, and their voices Cooper steps out of the shadows and carefully approaches He puts his ear to the door, hears nothing, then SLOWLY o
Cooper FLIPS the LIGHTSWITCH-- We see METAL SHELVES filled with supplies-- COOPER

Merry Christmas... Cooper quickly scans the shelves--he finds CANDLES, takes rummage-- He approaches a shelf containing CLEANING SUPPLIES, grabb Suddenly--we hear the sound of FOOTSTEPS approaching--Coo A SEASICK TERRORIST enters the supply room, looking very Cooper watches as the Terrorist looks for DRAMAMINE--groa SEASICK

Oh my God...I'm gonna puke... where is that shit... He finds the first aid supplies-- He pulls out a packet of TABLETS and fumbles with the wra He takes the pills and gulps them down-- Burping, he then STAGGERS out of the room-- When it's clear, Cooper continues searching-- He finds a box containing INDUSTRIAL COVERALLS--the same men-- He quickly grabs one and RIPS OPEN the PLASTIC--
Richter escorts Filmore to her quarters-- RICHTER
I hope you enjoy your accommodations Helen.  I want you to enjoy your time here with us-- Helen breaks her silence--faces Richter-- FILMORE
You understand that they're watching our every move right now--you think you're just going to sail away? RICHTER

It seems to me we are just sailing away.   They haven't sunk us yet, have they? Besides, don't you worry your pretty little head about that.  It's all been taken care of. Richter stops Filmore, and looks at her-- RICHTER
I know you're not too happy at this point.  It's too bad we weren't able to meet elsewhere, under different circumstances... FILMORE
Like where--in your dreams? Before Richter can respond, the seasick TERRORIST hurries SEASICK
Sorry--I was getting some seasick  pills.
RICHTER
Not to worry... He keeps his eyes on Filmore-- RICHTER
We were just saying goodnight. Without another word, Filmore turns and enters her quarte behind herself right in Richter's face. RICHTER
Guard her.  With your life. Richter heads down the corridor toward his own quarters-- The guard looks miserable and seasick--
Unseen by all, Cooper watches the whole thing-- He nods, knowing where to get her when the time comes-- He looks back behind him, looks back at Filmore's door, t He heads back the way he came--
Stockton enters the radio room, checking in-- STOCKTON
Any news from Kompong Som? OPERATOR
Yessir they've confirmed our E.T.A. and they're ready to pipe the cargo. STOCKTON
Good.  Won't be long now, my friend... soon we're gonna be very wealthy...

Richter pours BRANDY into a snifter, whistling "Popeye th back on the day, beside himself with insane confidence-- He laughs to himself, as he swirls the brandy in the snif He scans the shelf of BOOKS before him, selecting a copy RICHTER
Call me...goddamn Ishmael... He laughs and gets comfortable, turning to page one, sipp

Having turned down the lights, Filmore sits up in her bed She gazes through the shadows, exhausted but defiant-- The ship's steady swaying pacifies her.  She fights to ke .they close... She opens them again but it's no use...they close again.
The two randy SEAMEN from earlier round a corner-- They see the TERRORIST GUARD at Filmore's door-- RANDY SEAMAN1
Look at him--he's ready to spew... They approach him-- RANDY SEAMAN2 (quietly)
Looking a little green, brother... TERRORIST
I don't know how you fucking do this! RANDY SEAMAN 1
You have to get your sea legs. Hell I used to get sick all the time. RANDY SEAMAN 2
It's easy when the boat is going UP, and DOWN, and UP, and DOWN,... The terrorist doesn't need this... RANDY SEAMAN 1
Man I got so nauseous once...it was worse than the time I accidentally drank a cup of tobacco spit, could have sworn there were a few loogies in it-- The terrorist can't take much more--  TERRORIST
Jesus shut up! RANDY SEAMAN 2
Man in rough weather this boat just  rocks, and rocks, and rocks... RANDY SEAMAN 1

Yeah and if you get  bad cook that just keeps feeding you salty pork all the  time it's enough to-- The terrorist SPRINGS UP and flees down the hallway, hand The two seamen look at each other and smile drunkenly--
Filmore sleeps in dim shadows on her bed-- The door to her quarters OPENS and CLOSES with a CREAK-- Filmore BOLTS to attention-- FILMORE
Who is it! The two seamen stand like ghostly figures in the dim shad Concealing her fear, Filmore gets up and faces them-- FILMORE
I want you out of here at once. They push her back on the bed with malicious intent-- RANDY SEAMAN 1

Begging your pardon, ma'am--but your wants don't quite enter into it-- The lunge for her and she SCREAMS, trying to claw herself They PAW at her--she defends herself, KNEEING one hard in SCRATCHING the other--                                 This only fuels their determination-- FILMORE

Helllp! One grabs her, covering her mouth, stifling her cries-- The other RIPS OPEN her DRESS-- She struggles in vain as the seaman fondles her-- Loosening his pants the other seaman works himself up-- Filmore shuts her eyes, trying to block out the horror-- Suddenly the door to the cabin BURSTS OPEN-- A SHADOWY FIGURE OF A MAN rushes in, pulling the rapist o Filmore falls to the floor, struggling to see what's happ One seaman PULLS A KNIFE-- The man WRENCHES the seaman's arm yanking it HARD behind his ARM around his neck--YANKING HARD on the jaw--BREAKIN The other seaman CHARGES and catches the BLADE square in The two seaman collapse to the ground--DEAD. FILMORE
Cooper! SNAP!  RICHTER turns on the light, wiping his hands as if of flies-- RICHTER
I'm sorry what did you say? Filmore pales, then says nothing. Richter scrutinizes her for a second-- RICHTER
I'm sorry about this.  I'm going to have to have a few words with Stockton--his men need a lesson  in manners... Filmore looks very sexy and vulnerable at this moment-- RICHTER
Perhaps you'll find my quarters more to your liking-- She looks up at him in disbelief--

Cooper SLINKS into the boiler room-- He sees an ENGINEER manning the complicated devices that to the TURBINE BLADES. Cooper looks through a metal screen door and sees what he He silently enters the room and opens the gas can-- He pours the LYE into the can--it SIZZLES as he plunks th He takes the container and begins to SHAKE IT-- VOICE(O.S.)
Hey! Cooper whips around to see an ENGINEER-- ENGINEER1
What the hell are you doing? COOPER
Oh, hi. I'm one of Richter's men. ENGINEER
Oh yeah? The engineer is suspicious but Cooper plays it like a HIC COOPER
Yeah.  He wanted to make sure the  boats on deck are fueled... ENGINEER
They are. Cooper plays it cool-- COOPER
Oh... He puts the gas can down-- The other ENGINEER approaches-- COOPER
Good.  I'm beat enough as it is... He smiles at the two stone-faced engineers.  Cooper feign boiler room and walks out in the middle of it... COOPER
God-damn... The engineers follow him... COOPER
That's one hell of an engine! He looks at the two men-- COOPER
Far cry from the old outboard back home, you know what I mean, boys? The engineers begin to warm slightly-- ENGINEER2
Damn straight. Cooper focuses on a large, heavily gauged metal CONTRAPTI COOPER
This must power the turbines, huh? ENGINEER1
Sorta, yeah... Cooper walks around like a kid in a candy store--the engi idiot-- COOPER
Shit, what happens when this thing goes down? ENGINEER2
We got backup power over there. Cooper looks over at an electronic PANEL--The AUXILIARY A ENGINEER1

Don't worry junior, we're prepared for everything. Cooper nods like a dolt, smiling-- POW!  Cooper SMASHES the first engineer in the face--a LI crashes to the ground-- In the split second that follows Cooper WHIPS his   foot around and CONNECTS with the 2nd engineer's SKULL--s

Yeah you're prepared alright... Cooper heads over to the GAS CAN--picks it up-- He heads over to A CABINET that has a coffee machine, mic He rips open the drawers, finding a STEAK KNIFE...A CAN O He opens the GAS CAN with the opener--turning it upside d a brown substance resembling "SLIME" plops out on the cou He glances back over at the GENERATOR--
Stockton enters the bridge--meeting his FIRST MATE-- FIRST MATE
We're steady on course Captain. STOCKTON
At least some of us are!  No more drinking on this goddamn ship! He looks out the window-- STOCKTON
OK, Andrews lock her down-- FIRST MATE
Yes sir. Stockton settles back for what he anticipates will be a r seas--
The tanker makes its way through the moonlit waters--
Showing a blip northeast of the center of the grid--
A radar operator from ANOTHER SHIP is monitoring the tank OPERATOR
She's keeping a steady course, straight for Cambodia...
We see the COAST GUARD CUTTER slicing through the water, very safe distance--
A very haggard looking White, Myers, and Sen. Filmore   sit amid TV screens, CNN updates, and assistants on phone MYERS
Looks like Richter isn't acting alone--he's heading into some dangerous waters. SEN. FILMORE
She's as good as gone... MYERS
You can't think like that!  We're watching them like a hawk--he's  bound to trip up, make one false move-- WHITE
Richter can't run forever. The senator has given up all hope...
SEN. FILMORE
I don't know about that...
Her posture stiff and protected, Filmore sits in a chair moves around her. She keeps the corner of her eye on him, unsure of what he FILMORE
I suppose...you think I should thank you. RICHTER
Yes, you should. He pours two glasses of BRANDY. RICHTER
Overnight I've put us in the history books, Filmore.  It won't be long till we're legends in our own time. FILMORE
Seems to me you'll be dead soon, Richter. Richter bristles-- FILMORE
One hostage is not enough--you're a marked man. Richter smiles at her-- RICHTER
Much as I love you, Helen, you don't think I would have put all my eggs in one basket, would you?  Anything funny and... He laughs with delight-- RICHTER
...they have a catastrophe on their hands! He looks around the room-- RICHTER
No, I felt something when I first saw you.  And I know you felt something too. Filmore is disgusted with him.  He approaches her. RICHTER
We're one in the same, Helen.  We both  want it all. And we'll do what we can to  get it--isn't that the truth?  She ignores him-- RICHTER
I watched you as your old man's reputation went down the toilet--"misappropriation of funds"--you stayed out of it like a pro.   Filmore's eyes fill with tears. RICHTER
You see, it paid off--you broke away from the old guard, congresswoman.  It won't be long till they're calling you Senator Filmore-- FILMORE
Shut up! RICHTER
But it won't be enough, it will never be enough.  I know.  I understand you. He offers her a glass of brandy, which she weakly accepts RICHTER
To us...and to having everything. She just holds the glass, beyond caring-- RICHTER
Come on, drink up. FILMORE
I don't want any... RICHTER
I insist... FILMORE
I said I don't want any, goddammit! Richter GRABS the hair in the back of her head--HARD-- She freezes-- RICHTER
I said--I insist! She sips the brandy, staring hard at Richter--HATE burnin back, determined-- RICHTER

You're a very headstrong woman-- sometimes you tend to forget the impulses of your body--your desires-- He grabs her closer--VIOLENTLY-- Then-- BOOOOOMMMM!  A huge explosion is heard--the two feel a tr Filmore takes her brandy glass and SMASHES it over Richte it-- This enrages Richter, who yanks her by her arm and slams pulls out his GUN and shoves it hard into her temple-- RICHTER
Let's see what's happening, princess-- He shoves her out the door--
Stockton tries to radio the engine room, to no avail-- STOCKTON
The damn line's dead! FIRST MATE
Rudder's dead--navgation's dead--
Stockton grabs a FLASHLIGHT and a FIRE EXTINGUISHER and f A SEAMAN goes after him-- STOCKTON
Sounds like the goddamn engine blew!
Stockton runs down the corridor with the seaman-- passing COOPER, who emerges from a dark CORNER--he runs t
Two beams of light cut across the darkness--
Who's there!                        Who's that! STOCKTON and RICHTER surprise themselves with each other' faces-- RICHTER
What the hell happened! Stockton pushes past him--running toward the boiler room- STOCKTON
We got trouble-- Richter follows Stockton down the hall, dragging Filmore RICHTER
Are we adrift-- STOCKTON
If I don't get power up we are! RICHTER
Drop the anchor! STOCKTON
We can't--it's power driven! RICHTER
Get your men to do it!
STOCKTON
The thing weighs more than a ton-- you want to roll up your sleeves and try it?!
Stockton CRASHES IN--OTHERS ARE THERE--including the two FLAMES engulf the main GENERATOR, which is completely des Stockton FURIOUSLY DOUSES the fire with the extinguisher, the same thing--

The SEASICK GUARD from earlier is in the same area, looki any noise-- Suddenly there is a WHISTLING NOISE-- THUNK! The STEAK KNIFE juts out of the guards throat as h gurgling-- Cooper grabs the guard's SEMI AUTOMATIC and KICKS HIM out He stands back and KICKS the door to Filmore's quarters--
Through the moonlight Cooper can only find the two RANDY COOPER
Fuck!   Determined not to let her slip out of his hands again, he
Having successfully doused the flames, a soaked, sweating Filmore inspect the damage along with a couple of others- RICHTER
Get this shit-crate running!
Stockton glares at him--looking around the smoke-filled r STOCKTON
This "shit-crate" just lost her main engine--it isn't like changing a bulb! Stockton heads up some steps to the AUXILIARY ALTERNATOR- STOCKTON

The auxiliary alternator can get us lit and moving, but not for long-- Stockton opens a DOOR PANEL and unlocks a POWER SWITCH--h locks it in place-- The lights buzz on--Stockton looks at Richter-- STOCKTON
Seems like we got ourselves a saboteur, Richter! Suddenly Filmore's EYES WIDEN with hope-- Stockton turns to hear something POP-- He sees the BACK OF THE CONSOLE OPENED, and two POWER WIR
The alternator EXPLODES, ripping Stockton and several oth LEAPS out of harms way, dragging Filmore into the hall-- A ROARING FIRE ensues as the ship goes black again--
Richter heads out running, dragging an exhausted and dirt Two terrorists--BLACK and SMITTY--catch up-- BLACK
What the fuck is going on? RICHTER
We have a problem on our hands gentlemen!   A FIGURE approaches UP AHEAD-- RICHTER FIRES WILDLY at the man--SIX BULLETS in two secon The man splatters against the wall--it is RED-- FILMORE
Good shot! He looks at SMITTY without remorse, all the time walking RICHTER
Dump what barrels we can overboard  and get the launches ready--
Richter yanks Filmore away as the two terrorists take off

The OPERATOR is hammering out something in Morse code, re the only working piece of equipment he has-- Suddenly he is CHOKED FROM BEHIND-- Cooper shoves his GUN BARREL into the man's temple--the m COOPER
I hope you know your Morse code. I got something I want you to  spell for me! OPERATOR
Don't kill me please-- COOPER
The first letter is C... The man looks it up and enters something but Cooper is to harder on his head-- COOPER
That wasn't a C now was it--I'm  gonna give your sorry ass one more chance-- The operator enters the correct letter-- COOPER
The radar operator notices the Olympia is veering off cou OPERATOR
It looks like they're changing course, headed due north--
An assistant turns to Sen. Filmore, Myers and White-- ASSISTANT
Sirs! The men whip around-- ASSISTANT
The coast guard is reporting a Morse signal coming from the  Olympia! MYERS
A distress call? ASSISTANT
Yeah--a distress call-- The men wait-- ASSISTANT
Cooper--SOS-- Senator Filmore's EYES LIGHT UP--

Black and Smitty are rolling sealed BARRELS of the binary GANGWAY--one chemical in a green barrel, the other in a b They drop them into to the sea, leaving a floating trail . Suddenly-- BOOOOMMM!  An explosion RIPS through a lower deck, the fi through the crippled tanker-- BLACK
Fuck this!  Let's get out of here! The two men throw two more barrels overboard and take off
Richter prepares the LAUNCH to descend into the water--
Black and Smitty head toward another launch on the opposi Then Smitty sees Cooper, sprinting from back at the stern SMITTY
Shit! They aim and FIRE at him--he DIVES for cover-- He fires back--NAILING BLACK in the HEAD--he slams to the
Richter hears the gunfire and turns around-- Cooper dashes from one cover to another as Smitty fires-- Filmore sees him-- FILMORE
Cooper! Richter is truly amazed by this, but has no time for it-- RICHTER
Come on princess--its time we had a talk with your friend--
Cooper ducks down behind a cargo derrick, avoiding the gu ammo-- Suddenly-- RICHTER(O.S.)
Cooper?! Cooper perks up-- RICHTER(O.S.)
Cooper I think you better come out-- Cooper fingers his trigger... and WHIPS OUT-- Richter has his gun to Filmore's head-- RICHTER
Welcome back from the dead!  I don't know how you did it but at this point I don't really care. COOPER
It's over Richter.  Let her go! RICHTER

Over?  You slowed up my cargo that's for sure but least we forget Cooper your assignment was to protect the Congresswoman-- Cooper wants to make a move, but can't-- Smitty slowly approaches behind him-- RICHTER
So far your operation's a success but it would be a shame if the patient died now wouldn't it? Cooper says nothing-- RICHTER
Now I want you to put the gun down-- Cooper hesitates-- RICHTER

So help me sweet Jesus Christ I'll blow her fucking brains out right here and now--PUT THE GUN DOWN! Cooper obliges watching Richter for as much as one false behind Cooper-- Richter regains his composure-- RICHTER
Thank you! He gestures to SMITTY, who raises his rifle-- FILMORE

Cooper! BAM!  Smitty's rifle butt SMASHES Cooper on the head-- he falls and Smitty KICKS HIM IN THE FACE--HARD-- Cooper rolls violently as Smitty kicks his face again--WH Blood runs out of Cooper's mouth-- Richter drags a struggling Filmore into the launch and pu Smitty runs over to another launch and prepares to lower BOOOMMM!  another explosion rips through the ship--it lur

Richter and Filmore fall as the launch swings out and sla of the hull-- Cooper slowly comes to--completely disoriented--he shakes drunk boxer POV of a blurry, double-vision deck--Smitty descending in Cooper gets up, staggers, falls-- Smitty disappears from the deck, descending--
Richter and Filmore land in the water as Richter shoves F fires up the OUTBOARD motor--

Smitty is descending when suddenly-- Cooper LEAPS and lands on the deck of the launch-- SMITTY rams him, attempting to send Cooper overboard-- Struggling to keep his bearings, Cooper RETALIATES-- smashing Smitty in the face-- The two struggle-- One of the ROPES on the STERN begins to break as the men POW!  Smitty connects with Cooper--AGAIN-- But Cooper whips around and BACKHANDS Smitty before PASTI combination-- SNAP!  The stern line gives way as the boat swings in a d the hull-- Smitty tumbles backwards, grabbing the OUTBOARD to keep f Cooper DIVES and yanks the RIPCORD-- The engine ROARS to life, the PROPELLER grazing Smitty's Cooper YANKS the engine up-- The propeller SLICES OPEN SMITTY'S CHEST as he crashes in
The launch slowly descends--
Richter and Filmore speed away from the tanker as an EXPL sending debris through the air--

Cooper lets the last ropes free as Smitty climbs back up out-- He POUNCES on Cooper--who breaks free-- Cooper SMASHES SMITTY with a backhand-- Smitty CHARGES and PUSHES COOPER OVER-- Cooper's legs hook the edge as he falls in backwards-- He struggles to get up but Smitty SHOVES his face under, Cooper swallows water, suffocating-- Smitty clenches his teeth, using all his might to keep Co In a desperate surge of energy Cooper LIFTS HIS LEGS and
Smitty struggles to break free--

We see Cooper grimace and JERK-- SNAP--Smitty's jaw goes askew and his neck BREAKS-- Cooper FLIPS him overboard--the two men crash into the wa Cooper splashes to the surface coughing and struggles on propeller into the water---the boat SPEEDS OFF--
Richter and Filmore round the stern as COOPER approaches Richter speeds maniacally--wind RIPPING through his hair-

head_text.subj: FROM AROUND THE STERN COMES COOPER--

text: Richter raises his gun and FIRES at the fast-approaching Cooper ducks and aims his boat at theirs-- BANG BANG BANG--CLICK! CLICK!  Richter is out of ammo-- Filmore charges at him, trying to wrench him from the ste He CRACKS HER ACROSS THE FACE--she falls to the deck-- COOPER JAMS the boat into HIGH GEAR and begins to run par Richter slams his boat into Cooper's--Cooper's into his-- Then Cooper does the unexpected-- He LEAPS off the boat--ONTO RICHTER'S-- Cooper's boat begins to SPIRAL MADLY-- Cooper POUNCES on Richter--but Richter grabs Cooper by th the deck--                         Like two sinewy springs Nick legs send Richter airborne-- Richter crashes back-- the boat spins FURIOUSLY out of control-- Bleeding from the corner of her mouth Filmore reaches up keep her steady--the STEERING WHEEL-- the two men exchange WITHERING BLOWS as they stagger arou In a last-chance attempt at killing Cooper once for all h offensive that has Cooper's ears ringing-- But Cooper SURGES--sending Richter crashing to the stern- Cooper staggers back and looks ahead--

head_text.subj: THEY'RE SPEEDING TOWARD THE CENTER OF THE TANKER--NO WHER

text: Cooper GRABS Filmore and YANKS HER UP-- COOPER
They JUMP from the speeding BOAT tumbling violently into Richter looks up for a SECOND-- WHAM!!!! THE BOAT EXPLODES IN A FIREBALL against the hull Richter--
BOOOMMMM!!!  More explosions on the tanker create a domin Cooper swims as hard as he can, drags Filmore toward thei circle-- COOPER

Stay clear-- Cooper gets hold of a MOORING ROPE on the of the dangerou struggles aboard-- He runs and kills the engine--the boat slows down-- Cooper circles and nears FILMORE--he reaches out for her- She extends her hand but HE MISSES HER-- Cooper juices up the boat and CIRCLES AROUND HER AGAIN--t by the hand-- He yanks her safely on board-- The two collapse to the deck as a series of EXPLOSIONS on
Cooper fires up the boat and heads away from the tanker a BOOOOMMMM!!!! The tanker is BLOWN TO SMITHEREENS--it's hu
A sentry flashes a powerful beam out toward the flaming, Filmore and Cooper their boat a little speck in the water SENTRY
We've got survivors--about fifteen hundred feet southwest! We then see JACKSON step out on deck and look through his
Jackson sees Cooper and Filmore--very much alive-- Jackson lowers his binoculars in disbelief, smiling--
JACKSON
That son-of-a-bitch!
Myers is on the phone-- MYERS
Are you absolutely certain?!... Stand by! He looks to Myers and Sen. Filmore-- MYERS
It's over! Sen. Filmore drops his head in despair-- MYERS
Cooper got her out! Filmore looks up, as if the clouds parted to reveal heave

Passing floating barrels of the BINARY CHEMICALS,  they r and toward the RISING SUN.  On the horizon, the COAST GUA A wounded, exhausted Cooper and Filmore trade looks.  Mor an attraction in their eyes.  But neither really knows ho COOPER
Well Filmore-- FILMORE
Well Cooper... COOPER
Looks like you're not going to make that dinner after all... FILMORE
I guess not Cooper...  She looks out at dawn spreading across the horizon-- FILMORE
...but you can't say we didn't try... The boat heads off into the distance...
